channel.title: Encountering Problems in compile.bat. Please do have a l00k!
channel.description:
encountering this sort of problem in compile.bat :( :
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. [b]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFound[u]Error[/u]: server[/b] Press any key to continue. . .
(setting this in a quote because i putted in [b]"this"[/b] and [u]"this"[/u]) and the runserver.bat works fine :) : [code]Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 _[/code] problem is= everything putted in Java.client, shops, npc, autospawn, etc. is NOT working in my server. :( 1.Yes, i have Java JDK 5.0 update 9 2.Yes, my server is up and running with no-ip, portforward, and static IP 3.Yes, i tried a lot of stuff for solving this problem... 4.Yes i setted all other requested needs like it is in [TUT] on forum: "RS2 server tutorial" 5.I'm using TestScape Source. And... this is what's in my compile.bat file: [code]@echo off color 09 title tryitoutscape "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09injava.exe" server pause[/code][br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 02:58:11 PM[/size][hr]ONLINE AGAIN[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 02:58:33 PM[/size][hr]Could some1 plz help me?!?!?!

Hmmm… the only explanation I have for this is that something is just … coded wrong. Not coded with the wrong syntax, or with any programming errors, but just not telling the interpreter the right thing…

odd…

i will just take it out then…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 15, 2006, 08:43:36 AM[/size][hr]OH MAN!!! UR JUST TOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO GOOD…

item.title: Encountering Problems in compile.bat. Please do have a l00k!
item.dc:creator: @oh_yeah oh yeah
item.description:
@oh_yeah wrote:

encountering this sort of problem in compile.bat :

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. [b]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFound[u]Error[/u]: server[/b] Press any key to continue. . .

(setting this in a quote because i putted in “this” and “this”)

and the runserver.bat works fine :

Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 _

problem is= everything putted in Java.client, shops, npc, autospawn, etc. is NOT working in my server.

1.Yes, i have Java JDK 5.0 update 9
2.Yes, my server is up and running with no-ip, portforward, and static IP
3.Yes, i tried a lot of stuff for solving this problem…
4.Yes i setted all other requested needs like it is in [TUT] on forum: “RS2 server tutorial”
5.I’m using TestScape Source.

And… this is what’s in my compile.bat file:

@echo off color 09 title tryitoutscape "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09injava.exe" server pause[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 02:58:11 PM[/size][hr]ONLINE AGAIN[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 02:58:33 PM[/size][hr]Could some1 plz help me?!?!?!
